meta.title: Olivier Jeannette | Ops Architect & AI-Augmented Builder
meta.description: Former Special Forces Paramedic turned Tech Entrepreneur. I build systems that run themselves. Available for opportunities in Calgary, Alberta.

hero.badge: Open to opportunities in Alberta, Canada
hero.tagline: I build systems that run themselves.

about.label: About
about.title: Builder by nature,
bio: Former Special Forces Paramedic with combat medical experience, I transitioned to entrepreneurship by founding and scaling a CrossFit/HYROX gym in France to €120K annual revenue. I didn't just manage—I built every system from scratch.

My superpower: connecting the dots. Backend, frontend, infrastructure, AI—I don't code "pure", I build systems that work. Every project is an opportunity to eliminate friction and create lasting value. I replaced €3K/year in SaaS tools with custom solutions I built myself.
Currently relocating to Calgary, Alberta. I'm looking for opportunities where my hybrid tech/business/operations profile can make a real impact. High-intensity environments are where I thrive.

cta.title: Ready to work together?
cta.description: I'm currently open to opportunities in Calgary, Alberta. Let's discuss how I can bring value to your team.

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Operations architect with a unique background combining Special Forces medical training, entrepreneurship, and technical expertise. Built and scaled a CrossFit/HYROX gym from zero to €120K annual revenue while developing custom software solutions. Seeking opportunities in Alberta where I can leverage my hybrid tech/business profile to drive operational excellence.

interested.title: Interested?
interested.description: Download my complete resume in PDF format or contact me directly.

laskali.title: Founder & General Manager
description: Built and scaled a CrossFit/HYROX gym from zero to €120K annual revenue
Full P&L management: budgeting, pricing strategy, cost optimization
Developed custom software solutions replacing €3K/year in SaaS tools
Team management: hiring, training, scheduling of coaches
Digital marketing: SEO, Meta Ads, content strategy - achieved Top 3 Google ranking for 'CrossFit Laval'
Event organization: competitions, workshops, community events

coach-auto.title: Sports Coach - Self-Employed
description: Personal training and small group coaching
Client acquisition and retention strategies
Custom training program design

coach-stagiaire.title: Sports Coach Intern - BPJEPS AF
description: BPJEPS AF work-study program (Weightlifting/Bodybuilding option)
Group fitness classes and personal training
Member follow-up and program design

coach-benevole.title: Volunteer Cross-Training Coach
description: Volunteer cross-training coach while discovering the fitness industry
Group class management and exercise technique coaching

military.title: Special Forces Operator - Combat Paramedic
description: Combat Paramedic in French Special Forces unit
Multiple deployments to Africa and Middle East
Team pharmacy manager and medical supplies logistics
Tactical Combat Casualty Care (TCCC) specialist
High-stress decision making in hostile environments

surveillant.title: School Supervisor
description: Student supervision and boarding school management
Sports activities organization
